about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Patra Purbaya, a Senior Mobile Flutter Developer specializing in Android and iOS development since 2020.
about.description: Graduated with a Diploma III in Teknik Informatika from Politeknik Negeri Pontianak, I've dedicated my career to creating exceptional mobile experiences that combine beautiful design with functional, user-friendly interfaces.

heroSection.name: Patra Purbaya
heroSection.title: Web Developer
heroSection.description: I craft responsive websites where technology meets creativity.

aboutSection.title: About Me
aboutSection.description: I'm a passionate Web Developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. My journey in web development started with a curiosity about how websites work, and has evolved into a professional career where I help businesses establish their online presence. I enjoy creating intuitive, responsive web experiences that solve real problems.
aboutSection.skills: My skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and more.

experiences.description: Lead development of web applications for various clients. Manage team of junior developers and implement best practices.
Developed responsive websites for clients across different industries. Collaborated with designers to implement visual elements.
Assisted in development of web applications. Learned various technologies and contributed to codebase improvements.
